title: Harvard economist says his $100 Bitcoin prediction was a wrong call
summary: Rogoff's misjudgment highlights the unpredictable nature of cryptocurrency markets and the challenges in forecasting regulatory impacts. The post Harvard economist says his $100 Bitcoin prediction was a wrong call appeared first on Crypto Briefing .

title: CFTC Wins $228M Judgment Against Pastor Who Ran Crypto Ponzi Promising 5-10% Weekly Returns
summary: CFTC wins $228M judgment against pastor Eddy Alexandre and his company EminiFX for operating massive crypto Ponzi scheme that promised guaranteed weekly returns of 5-10% through non-existent technology while defrauding over 25,000 investors of $262M between September 2021 and May 2022. The post CFTC Wins $228M Judgment Against Pastor Who Ran Crypto Ponzi Promising 5-10% Weekly Returns appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: AMTD Firms Roll Out Crypto-for-Stock Swap Program on NYSE
summary: Three affiliated AMTD Group companies have announced a program that would allow crypto holders to swap digital assets for newly issued shares. The post AMTD Firms Roll Out Crypto-for-Stock Swap Program on NYSE appeared first on Cryptonews .
